title: | Steps taken to alleviate water scarcity in open areas

tasks.task: Drive a vehicle on the farm.
subtasks: Sit in the driver's seat.
Accelerate and decelerate the tractor.
Steer the tractor to maneuver around fields and obstacles.
Shift gears using the manual transmission.
Adjust the rearview mirror for visibility.

tasks.task: Apply pesticide to crops using a sprayer.
subtasks: Load the pesticide tank with the required chemicals.
Operate the sprayer to even distribute the pesticide.
Direct the sprayer nozzle towards the crops to apply pesticide.
Monitor the pressure and flow rate of the pesticide being sprayed.
Approach the hay bale stack with a forklift.
Elevate the forks to pick up the hay bale.
Position the hay bale over the trailer bed.
Lower the forked bale into the trailer.
Repeat for additional hay bales until the trailer is full.

tasks.task: Collect eggs from a chicken coop.
subtasks: Enter the chicken coop premises.
Walk around the chicken area to locate nesting boxes.
Gently pick up eggs from the nesting boxes.
Place collected eggs into a basket or tray.
Exit the coop and move eggs to a storage location.
Inspect the machinery for any signs of wear or damage.
Lubricate moving parts as necessary.
Tighten loose bolts or nuts.
Service the fuel system to ensure proper operation.
Check fluid levels (oil, coolant, etc.) in the machinery.

tasks.task: Drive a vehicle on the farm.
Apply pesticide to crops using a sprayer.
Collect eggs from a chicken coop.
